001/*
002 * SPDX-FileCopyrightText: none
003 * SPDX-License-Identifier: CC0-1.0
004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IItemType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CustomCollectors;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
020
021import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.ServiceLoader;
027import java.util.ServiceLoader.Provider;
028import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
029import java.util.stream.Stream;
030
031import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
032import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
033import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
034import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
035
036/**
037 * This class provides a singleton service to allow data types to be discovered
038 * within the system based on an SPI provided by {@link IDataTypeProvider}.
039 */
040public final class DataTypeService {
041  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DataTypeService.class);
042  private static final Lazy<DataTypeService> INSTANCE = Lazy.lazy(DataTypeService::new);
043
044  private static final List<IItemType> BUILTIN_ITEM_TYPES;
045
046  static {
047    List<IItemType> builtinItemTypes = new LinkedList<>();
048    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.item());
049    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.array());
050    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.map());
051    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.node());
052    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.document());
053    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.assembly());
054    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.field());
055    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.flag());
056    builtinItemTypes.add(IItemType.module());
057
058    BUILTIN_ITEM_TYPES = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(builtinItemTypes);
059  }
060
061  @NonNull
062  private final Map<Integer, IAtomicOrUnionType<?>> typeByQNameIndex;
063  @NonNull
064  private final Map<Class<? extends IDataTypeAdapter<?>>, IDataTypeAdapter<?>> atomicTypeByAdapterClass;
065  @NonNull
066  private final Map<Class<? extends IAnyAtomicItem>, IAtomicOrUnionType<?>> atomicTypeByItemClass;
067  @NonNull
068  private final Map<Class<? extends IItem>, IItemType> itemTypeByItemClass;
069
070  /**
071   * Get the singleton service instance, which will be lazy constructed on first
072   * access.
073   *
074   * @return the service instance
075   */
076  @SuppressWarnings("null")
077  @NonNull
078  public static DataTypeService instance() {
079    return INSTANCE.get();
080  }
081
082  private DataTypeService() {
083    ServiceLoader<IDataTypeProvider> loader = ServiceLoader.load(IDataTypeProvider.class);
084
085    this.atomicTypeByAdapterClass = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(
086        loader.stream()
087            .map(Provider<IDataTypeProvider>::get)
088            .flatMap(provider -> provider.getJavaTypeAdapters().stream())
089            .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(
090                dataType -> ObjectUtils.asNullableType(dataType.getClass()),
091                CustomCollectors.identity(),
092                (key, v1, v2) -> {
093                  if (LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
094                    LOGGER.warn("Duplicate data type class '{}'. Using the first.",
095                        key.getClass().getName());
096                  }
097                  return v1;
098                },
099                LinkedHashMap::new))));
100
101    Stream<Map.Entry<Integer, IAtomicOrUnionType<?>>> adapterStream = this.atomicTypeByAdapterClass.values().stream()
102        .flatMap(dataType -> dataType.getNames().stream()
103            .map(qname -> Map.entry(qname.getIndexPosition(), dataType.getItemType())));
104
105    Stream<Map.Entry<Integer, IAtomicOrUnionType<?>>> abstractStream = loader.stream()
106        .map(Provider<IDataTypeProvider>::get)
107        .flatMap(provider -> provider.getAbstractTypes().stream())
108        .map(dataType -> Map.entry(dataType.getQName().getIndexPosition(), dataType));
109
110    this.typeByQNameIndex = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(
111        Stream.concat(abstractStream, adapterStream)
112            .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(
113                Map.Entry::getKey,
114                Map.Entry::getValue,
115                (key, v1, v2) -> {
116                  if (LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
117                    LOGGER.warn("Duplicate data types '{}' and '{}' with name '{}'. Using the first.",
118                        v1.getClass().getName(),
119                        v2.getClass().getName(),
120                        key);
121                  }
122                  return v1;
123                },
124                ConcurrentHashMap::new))));
125
126    this.atomicTypeByItemClass = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(
127        this.typeByQNameIndex.values().stream()
128            .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(
129                type -> ObjectUtils.asNullableType(type.getItemClass()),
130                CustomCollectors.identity(),
131                (key, v1, v2) -> {
132                  if (!Objects.equals(v1, v2) && LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
133                    LOGGER.warn("Duplicate atomic item class '{}' declared by types '{}' and '{}'. Using the first.",
134                        key.getName(),
135                        v1.toSignature(),
136                        v2.toSignature());
137                  }
138                  return v1;
139                },
140                ConcurrentHashMap::new))));
141
142    this.itemTypeByItemClass = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableMap(ObjectUtils.notNull(
143        Stream.concat(
144            BUILTIN_ITEM_TYPES.stream(),
145            this.atomicTypeByItemClass.values().stream())
146            .collect(CustomCollectors.toMap(
147                type -> ObjectUtils.asNullableType(type.getItemClass()),
148                CustomCollectors.identity(),
149                (key, v1, v2) -> {
150                  if (!Objects.equals(v1, v2) && LOGGER.isWarnEnabled()) {
151                    LOGGER.warn("Duplicate item class '{}' declared by types '{}' and '{}'. Using the first.",
152                        key.getName(),
153                        v1.toSignature(),
154                        v2.toSignature());
155                  }
156                  return v1;
157                },
158                ConcurrentHashMap::new))));
159  }
160
161  /**
162   * Lookup a specific {@link IAtomicOrUnionType} by its QName.
163   *
164   * @param qname
165   *          the qualified name of data type adapter to get the instance for
166   * @return the data type or {@code null} if the data type is unknown to the type
167   *         system
168   */
169  @SuppressFBWarnings(value = "NP_NULL_ON_SOME_PATH_FROM_RETURN_VALUE", justification = "false positive")
170  @Nullable
171  public IAtomicOrUnionType<?> getAtomicTypeByQName(@NonNull IEnhancedQName qname) {
172    return EQNameFactory.instance()
173        .get(qname.getIndexPosition())
174        .map(name -> getAtomicTypeByQNameIndex(name.getIndexPosition()))
175        .orElse(null);
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * Lookup a specific {@link IAtomicOrUnionType} by its QName index position.
180   *
181   * @param qnameIndexPosition
182   *          the position in the global QName index for the qualified name of
183   *          data type adapter to get the instance for
184   * @return the data type or {@code null} if the data type is unknown to the type
185   *         system
186   */
187  @Nullable
188  public IAtomicOrUnionType<?> getAtomicTypeByQNameIndex(int qnameIndexPosition) {
189    return typeByQNameIndex.get(qnameIndexPosition);
190  }
191
192  /**
193   * Lookup a specific {@link IAtomicOrUnionType} by its item class.
194   *
195   * @param clazz
196   *          the adapter class to get the instance for
197   * @return the data type or {@code null} if the data type is unknown to the type
198   *         system
199   */
200  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
201  @Nullable
202  public <T extends IAnyAtomicItem> IAtomicOrUnionType<T> getAtomicTypeByItemClass(Class<T> clazz) {
203    return (IAtomicOrUnionType<T>) atomicTypeByItemClass.get(clazz);
204  }
205
206  /**
207   * Lookup a specific {@link IAtomicOrUnionType} by its item class.
208   *
209   * @param clazz
210   *          the adapter class to get the instance for
211   * @return the data type or {@code null} if the data type is unknown to the type
212   *         system
213   */
214  @Nullable
215  public IItemType getItemTypeByItemClass(Class<? extends IItem> clazz) {
216    return itemTypeByItemClass.get(clazz);
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Lookup a specific {@link IDataTypeAdapter} by its adapter class.
221   *
222   * @param clazz
223   *          the adapter class to get the instance for
224   * @param <TYPE>
225   *          the type of the requested adapter
226   * @return the adapter or {@code null} if the adapter is unknown to the type
227   *         system
228   */
229  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
230  @Nullable
231  public <TYPE extends IDataTypeAdapter<?>> TYPE getDataTypeByAdapterClass(
232      @NonNull Class<TYPE> clazz) {
233    return (TYPE) atomicTypeByAdapterClass.get(clazz);
234  }
235}
